trans-unit.source: Represents the Conditions element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.5.1].
trans-unit.target: 代表 [Saml2Core 2.5.1] 中指定的條件項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
trans-unit.target: 如需此類別代表之項目的詳細資訊，請參閱 SAML V2.0 核心規格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies the audience to which the assertion is addressed.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的定址判斷提示的對象的集合。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: The AudienceRestrictions element.
trans-unit.target: AudienceRestrictions 項目。

trans-unit.source: A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> that specifies the audience for the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 型別的集合<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref>指定判斷提示的對象。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is empty no restrictions on the audience apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合是空的適用對象沒有限制也適用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the earliest time instant at which the assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的最早時間立即判斷提示無效。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: The NotBefore attribute.
trans-unit.target: 中的 NotBefore 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that contains the time instant in UTC.
trans-unit.target: 可為 null<xref:System.DateTime>其中包含的時間-utc 時區立即。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value indicates that the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>值會指出屬性不存在。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotOnOrAfter*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and an attempt to set a value that occurs on or after the time instant specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotOnOrAfter*> property occurs.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 屬性不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>並嘗試所設定的值，就會發生在或之後所指定的時間立即<> *> 屬性，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time instant at which the assertion has expired.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定判斷提示已過期的時間片刻。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: The NotOnOrAfter attribute.
trans-unit.target: NotOnOrAfter 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that contains the time instant in UTC.
trans-unit.target: 可為 null<xref:System.DateTime>其中包含的時間-utc 時區立即。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value indicates that the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>值會指出屬性不存在。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotBefore*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and an attempt to set a value that occurs before the time instant specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotBefore*> property occurs.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 屬性不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>和嘗試設定值，就會發生在之前所指定的時間立即<> *> 屬性，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the assertion should be used immediately and must not be retained for future use.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定判斷提示是否應該立即使用並不會保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: The OneTimeUse element.
trans-unit.target: OneTimeUse 項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the assertion should be used immediately; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該立即; 使用判斷提示否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the limitations that the asserting party imposes on relying parties that wish to subsequently act as asserting parties themselves and issue assertions of their own on the basis of the information contained in the original assertion.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定判斷提示的合作對象會加諸的限制，在想要後續做為本身判斷提示的合作對象與原始的判斷提示中所包含的資訊根據自己的問題判斷提示的信賴憑證者合作對象。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: The ProxyRestriction element.
trans-unit.target: ProxyRestriction 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2ProxyRestriction"></xref> that contains the restrictions placed on subsequent asserting parties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2ProxyRestriction"> </xref>包含後續判斷提示的合作對象的限制。
